title: Oracle up as it beats expectations - CNBC
description: Oracle found revenue growth from cloud applications in its fiscal fourth quarter, which helped it surpass analysts' expectations.

title: Dow Jones Up, Beaten By Nasdaq Again; This Sector Revs Big Gains After Fed News - Investor's Business Daily
description: The Nasdaq rose just 0.4% on Thursday, but it beat the Dow Jones. This sector helps make growth stocks look more bullish lately.

title: Bitcoin's digital gold, but Facebook's Libra is the digital dollar—here's why that matters - CNBC
description: Resident "Fast Money" crypto expert Brian Kelly breaks down the major differences between bitcoin and Facebook's new cryptocurrency Libra.

title: Capital - Why this coffee costs $75 - BBC News
description: Gourmet, speciality coffees have swept the world in the past several years. But what makes this particular coffee strain so valuable - valuable enough to fetch $75 a cup?

title: Harley-Davidson Is Fighting For Its Life by Building Anti-Harleys in Asia - Jalopnik
description: Harley-Davidson is in trouble, and has been for some time. Young people in America don’t want the big, heavy motorcycles that are Harley’s main business, and President Trump’s trade war has been nigh disastrous. So it increasingly has turned to Asia. Pretty s…

title: Oreo-owner Mondelez to take majority stake in Perfect Bar-parent, Perfect Snacks - CNBC
description: The deal for Perfect Bar's parent gives Mondelez a further foothold in snacking, as more people eat on-the-go.

title: Should Passengers Dread The A321XLR? - One Mile at a Time
description: The A321XLR is an incredible plane that will open up many new long haul routes. But should passengers dread the prospect of flying it?

title: Facebook’s Mark Zuckerberg falls in Glassdoor’s list of top CEOs based on employee feedback - Fox Business
description: Facebook’s Mark Zuckerberg has once again claimed a spot on Glassdoor’s annual list of the top 100 CEOs in the U.S., but his ranking is not as high as it has been in the past.

title: Dairy Queen celebrates start of summer with free ice cream - wpde.com
description: LYNCHBURG, Va. (WSET) -- The start of summer just got sweeter! On Friday, June 21 Dairy Queen is celebrating summer with free ice cream. Using the Dairy Queen mobile app, ice cream lovers can get a free small regular or dipped cone with any purchase. The offe…

title: Facebook Talked to the Fed About Libra, Chairman Powell Says - CoinDesk
description: Fed chair Jerome Powell was asked about Facebook's Libra cryptocurrency during a press conference Wednesday.

title: YouTube facing investigation from federal government over inability to protect children - The Verge
description: YouTube’s inability to protect children from predatory behavior on its platform has led to an investigation from the federal government, according to a new Washington Post report.

title: Taco Bell is testing plant-based proteins - Yahoo Finance
description: The hype around plant-based proteins is hot, and Taco Bell is looking to jump on the bandwagon.
